snippet.title: Irena Genesis Metal Fury - Trailer
snippet.description:
Into a universe mixing sci-fi and 80s atmosphere, take control of the Rayden MG-323 towards a hostile planet and destroy everything in your way for maximum pleasure on SEGA Genesis / Mega Drive!


More info: https://www.whiteninjastudio.com/games/genesis/irena-genesis-metal-fury
